snippet: The singer and songwriter Ben Howard carried on a legacy of late-1960s guitarists at the Bowery Ballroom.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by singer and songwriter Ben Howard at the Bowery Ballroom.
lead_paragraph: The singer and songwriter Ben Howard carried on a legacy of late-1960s guitarists at the Bowery Ballroom.

headline.main: Happiness May Be Here, but Desperation Is Often Close
